function RYU_EP04_02()
    -- .序章-2【11月第1週】「叶わぬ恋の唄」
    SaveData.Title = "叶わぬ恋の唄"

    -- //BG：繁華街
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG004aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

    MSG([[ Two and a half years ago. An incident occurred during an outdoor study session held jointly with the high school division. ]])

    MSG([[ While walking down a city street, my friend suffered a burn on her hand caused by a man smoking while walking. ]])

    -- //BU：モブ男性
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB13aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("suit-man2_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Suit-wearing man】
 "I told you, I don't know anything about that. Aren't you mistaken?" ]])

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0486.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "No, I clearly saw it. The moment the cigarette in your hand touched her hand." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0487.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Please apologize to her. How can you behave like that after leaving a wound that might leave a mark on a woman's hand?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The man responsible kept denying the accusation, feigning ignorance. He secretly discarded the cigarette that was evidence and insisted it was all a misunderstanding. ]])

    MSG([[ His attitude, utterly unbecoming of an adult man, deeply angered me at the time. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0488.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "We’re not asking you to take responsibility or anything. We just want you to admit your fault and apologize." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU03da")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0489.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Why can’t an adult like you do such a simple thing?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：モブ男性（スーツ）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB13aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,300,0)

PLAY_VOICE("suit-man2_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Suit-wearing man】
 "You girls who don’t know the hardships of work want me to apologize? Don’t underestimate adults." ]])

    MSG([[ The man stepped closer aggressively and glared menacingly at us. ]])

    -- //BU：モブ女生徒×３
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-300,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB05aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(60,-700,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB06aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(65,700,0)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0163.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Friends】
 "Eek!" ]])

    MSG([[ Behind me, my friends were frightened. ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    --LAYER_LOAD(65,"")

    MSG([[ How could he turn to threats in this situation? Why are men able to act so boldly toward fragile women? ]])

    MSG([[ Why can they look down on women so easily? ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0490.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "You fool! Show some shame!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I shouted in anger, overwhelmed by the sheer unfairness of it all. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("suit-man2_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Suit-wearing man】
 "Whaaaat?!" ]])

    MSG([[ The man seemed even angrier at my words and tried to shout back at me. ]])

    MSG([[ However―― ]])

    -- //BU：モブ男性、マリカ（通常）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB13aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,300,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "That’s enough." ]])

    MSG([[ An unknown woman stepped in and calmed the man down. ]])

    MSG([[ She gently stroked my head as one would soothe a baby and glared fiercely at the man. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0024.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Did you just try to threaten this girl? An adult like you. To young girls like these." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("suit-man2_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Suit-wearing man】
 "It’s their fault! They’re making a fuss claiming I hurt someone with my cigarette while walking!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("suit-man2_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Suit-wearing man】
 "I’m busy! I don’t have time to deal with kids! Sorry, but I’m leaving now!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0025.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "If you’re done, then please go. Salaryman from Prinny Corporation." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("suit-man2_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Suit-wearing man】
 "...Huh!?" ]])

    MSG([[ The company name she mentioned struck a nerve, and the man voiced his surprise. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0026.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Fufu, it takes some guts to threaten kids while holding a paper bag that has your company’s logo on it, doesn’t it?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0027.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "The basics of being a working adult are report, contact, and consult. I’ll be sure to report your courage to your company." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0028.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Including the walking-cigarette incident, naturally." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("suit-man2_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Suit-wearing man】
 "P-please stop..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0029.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Sorry, I didn’t catch that. Could you speak as loudly as when you were threatening these girls earlier?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("suit-man2_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Suit-wearing man】
 "I-I was wrong! Please forgive me to my company!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0030.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Wrong person to say that to, isn’t it?" ]])

    MSG([[ Prompted by her, the man hurried toward us and bowed repeatedly, apologizing profusely. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0031.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Ufufu, an apology won’t erase the injury, though." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("suit-man2_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Suit-wearing man】
 "Eek! Pl-please! Take this money as compensation!" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ In a panic, the man handed over 30,000 yen for medical expenses to the woman and fled. ]])

    MSG([[ The woman smiled as she handed the money to my friend, who had been burned. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0032.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Do you know there’s a dermatologist nearby? For burns like that, they can heal it nicely. Why not go after school?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0033.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Well then, see you later<sprite="Emoji" name="note">, future underclassmen." ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0164.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Friends】
 "I-is that Marika Ikusa-sama, who recently became a ‘Princess’...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0165.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Friends】
 "S-she’s too beautiful... and so brave at that." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0166.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Friends】
 "I... will treasure this money for life." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0491.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "N-no... please make sure to get proper treatment." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ —Marika Ikusa. Though I couldn’t get as excited as my friends, that name was firmly etched in my heart. ]])

    MSG([[ That day, I made up my mind. ]])

    MSG([[ To become a woman who protects other women without backing down even when the opponent is a man, just like Marika-sama. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BG：男子部教室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：エリカ（笑顔）

    MSG([[ Erika’s personality is different from Marika-sama’s, but like her, she has the charm that draws the hearts of other girls. ]])

    MSG([[ A mysterious aura unlike other female students. Dependable decisiveness when it counts. And always a sincere spirit that respects others. ]])

    MSG([[ All of that captures my heart and never lets go. ]])

    MSG([[ I know it’s an impossible love between women. I understand that after graduating from Yuriai Private Academy, I will have to live as someone’s wife. ]])

    MSG([[ Even so, even so―― ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01da")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0492.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika, please allow me to love you, at least for the time we attend this academy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
STOP_BGM(2000)
    -- //BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- 　第四章「ボク姫様と姫巫女様」

    -- 　　　　◆

    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP04_03")
end
